document_data.name: Sardonyx Knights
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sardonyx Knights''' were an order of [[crusader]]s devoted to [[Grumbar]], the King of the Land Below the Roots.
document_data.Organization: Members of the order guarded Grumbar's various holy sites against intruders and led any military operations sponsored by the [[Church of Grumbar]]. It fell to the crusaders to also punish any of Grumbar's faithful who broke their sacred oaths.
